New Records: Georges Mikautadze is the only player at Euro 2024 to score three times in the group stage.
Georges Mikautadze is the only player to score in all of his side's group-stage games at Euro 2024, joining an exclusive list of eight players who have done that previously.
Key Match Events: Khvicha Kvaratskhelia scored a goal after just 93 seconds, setting Georgia on the path to their famous victory.
Giorgi Mikautadze scored a penalty in the 57th minute to extend Georgia's lead.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This marked the lowest possession by a winning team at the European Championship on record (since 1980).
Others: Khvicha Kvaratskhelia was awarded UEFA's Player of the Match award.
The last-16 ties will be played on June 29, June 30, July 1, and July 2.
